thread.title: Steven Carnall
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Steven Carnall

author: Steven Carnall
title: Steven Carnall
text:
The flowers artived early morning & were tecieved with great happiness. Very happy with the service, thankyou. I was a little scared because i used another company before & they were 2 days late & didnt refund for a vase that was not delivered..!
Highly recommend your company.. Thankyou again
